mosinstall.copyright: (c) 2006 Sam Moffatt/Toowoomba City Council. All Rights Reserved
mosinstall.description: The personal content module displays a content item based on the user.

param.name: default_cid
param.label: Default Content Item
param.description: This is a content item to display when there is no other option for a logged in user. This will default to the anonymous setting if this is not set.

param.name: anonymous_cid
param.label: Anonymous Content Item
param.description: This is a content item to display when there is no one logged in.
